message: I've been reading the reactions to Jobs' resignation (they're inescapable) and have come across a few myths that are talked about repeatedly. I wanted to dispel the most popular one of them, that Steve Jobs is still leading strategy and product design at Apple. http://jaredbrown.me/post/9531000765/dispelling-a-myth-about-steve-jobs-resignation I'm interested in getting a conversation started around any other myths people have seen come out of this news.
